short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an expand button to the unifi video interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No affiliation with Ubiquity in any way. Adds an expand button to the unifi video "live view" page that makes the video feed take up the whole tab, then provides an exit button in the top right.  The code is posted on github if anyone wants
